meanings.definition: The degree or intensity of heat present in a substance or object.
meanings.sent1: The temperature of the soup was too hot to eat.
meanings.sent2: She checked the temperature outside before deciding what to wear.
meanings.sent3: The cat refused to go outside because the temperature was too chilly for her liking.
meanings.sent4: His anger reached a boiling temperature when he found out about the betrayal.
meanings.sent5: The temperature of the fire was so intense that it melted the plastic.

meanings.definition: A measure of the warmth or coldness of an object or environment.
meanings.sent1: The temperature of the water in the pool was perfect for swimming.
meanings.sent2: The weather forecast predicted a drop in temperature for the weekend.
meanings.sent3: The penguin complained about the temperature being too warm in the Antarctic.
meanings.sent4: Her smile brought a warm temperature to the room.
meanings.sent5: The temperature of his kindness was felt by everyone around him.
